title: Celebrate Stufful’s Pokémon GO Community Day with these tips and tricks
content:
Today’s Pokémon GO Community Day spotlights Stufful, the Alolan creature that resembles a little bear. From 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time trainers around the world will be able to find more of this monster in the wild, with the shiny version of Stufful available for the first time ever.

more…

The post Celebrate Stufful’s Pokémon GO Community Day with these tips and tricks appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Today’s Pokémon GO Community Day spotlights Stufful, an Alolan creature. Here are some tips and tricks to enjoy this event.
